page.title: 06Leisure.
page.content: Most of the people spend their leisure time{gardening, reading}or {watching television,}but{Darts}and {Bingo}are also popular. In the main the activities take place in the village hall. At the moment this is a prefabricated building but the villagers are raising money to build a new hall in the near future. {Bingo}is held in the{village hall every{Thursday.}This prize bingo is very popular and people come from the surrounding villages to play. {Biggin Youth Organisation This also takes place in the village hall.Snooker,darts,table tennis and cards are provided for 8_18 year olds. {Football_}Biggin has been renowned for its football team,but it has been temporarily disbanded this year.
